thread.title: Very Happy Customer
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Very Happy Customer

author: Very Happy Customer
title: Very Happy Customer
text: Customer Service was excellent, not push and did not follow me around the store. The staff let me look but also let me know they were there for me if I needed anything. Great store
